question: Who chairs the NITI Aayog's Governing Council meeting?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is to chair the sixth meeting of the NITI Aayog's Governing Council sixth. Problems related to agriculture, infrastructure, manufacturing and human resource development will be discussed in the meeting.
The council is the apex body of NITI Aayog, which includes all chief ministers, Lieutenant Governors of Union Territories (UTs), Union ministers and senior Government officials.
